ActNuclear Liability and Compensation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Nuclear Liability and Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the NUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to remove item 10, Saskatchewan Research Council: SLOWPOKE 2 Reactor, as a nuclear installation from the Schedule to the Regulations.
